__e: You have until the count of three, or I will kill you.
Because I listened to those who came before me and counted on those under me.
By the time I count to ten you will have told me exactly what I need to know.
I mean, you guys were counting on me and I let you down.
[Sighs] My days are numbered... and the number is three.
You've always counted and I've always trusted you.
I've seen what happens when people think their days are numbered. It's ugly.
After tonight, everyone's gonna be talking about how I'm back and your days are numbered.
I'm pretty sure that my days are numbered, no, but it does hurt that you can't quite see how much you need me.
